PerfectNetExp.abs: ⑷　荒诞的先锋——拼贴（Pastiche）　　 拼贴是后现代主义的重要表征，而后现代主义的种种策略则是为了解构或推翻电影（及其他传 …
这就是后现代的‘拼凑’(pastiche)式迷幻感冲岛二是专一的发型师、久利生公平是正义的化身、木村拓哉是因为深爱工藤静香而甘冒
陈琦GRE词汇-此心安处-搜狐博客 ... capriccio 狂想曲, 随想曲 pastiche 混成曲大杂烩 anthology 文学作品集.
以后现代最常用的混仿(pastiche)为创作核心风格，透过手绘、集锦嫁接、拼贴合成、风格杂糅等视觉语汇，发展成动画风格，描述当 …

list.abs: 文学理论批评术语汇释 - 王先霈 -... ... 怀旧（ nostalgia） 拼凑和戏仿（ pastiche and parody） 拼贴（ collage）.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from French, from Italian pasticcio, based on late Latin pasta 'paste'

entry.tran: （文学作品、音乐等的）模仿作品；（融合各种风格的）集成之作
entry.def: A pastiche is something such as a piece of writing or music in which the style is copied from somewhere else, or which contains a mixture of different styles.

example.ex: Peter Baker's bathroom is a brilliant pastiche of expensive interior design.
example.tran: 彼得·贝克的浴室是高档室内设计的集大成之作。

means.word_mean: 1. a musical composition consisting of a series of songs or other musical pieces from various sources
2. a work of art that imitates the style of some previous work
